eegdash.dataset.DS004514
========================

Simultaneous EEG and fNIRS recordings for semantic decoding of imagined animals and tools (OpenNeuro ``ds004514``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg, fnirs` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 2` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 12` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 24` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

-------------------

     - ``DS004514``
   * - Title
     - Simultaneous EEG and fNIRS recordings for semantic decoding of imagined animals and tools
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Milan Rybář, Riccardo Poli, Ian Daly

     - `doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds004514.v1.1.2 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds004514.v1.1.2>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds004514>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds004514>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS004514

   dataset = DS004514(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004514(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004514(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
